title: [Valina's Herbs and Tinctures]
description: Sunlight streams in through a clear glaes skylight, bathing the room in a warm and comforting glow.  Cots covered with starched white sheets are lined up in neat rows along one wall.  Alongside each cot, a small table holds bottles and jars of various potions and tinctures.

Moonlight streams in through a clear glaes skylight, bathing the room in a cool silvery glow.  Glaesine lamps provide dim illumination by which the healers work their art.  Cots covered with starched white sheets are lined up in neat rows along one wall.  Alongside each cot, a small table holds bottles and jars of various potions and tinctures.
